songs.title: Luh You
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
We must've been together
I bet you knew just who I was
Somewhere around your second lifetime
We danced on Persian rugs
We fucked and fell in love tonight

[Pre Hook]
It's who we are
Too familiar, solar
Energy carried on and on and on
Ripples in the pond
Like a mirror, solar
Energy carried on and on and

[Hook]
Hey, I think I luh you (luh you)
Fuck that, I know I do, I know I do, I know I do, I know I do
I think I luh you (luh you)
Fuck that, I know I do, I know I do, I know I do, I know I do

[Verse 2]
Few shots, then we rid them off
Goofed off in the loft
With the Scope on I can kill them all
We can be lovers two souls in a different life
But you know we done here been here before
How did you know we only sip clear liquor
Smoke purple endo, top floor level
Type of shit that get
Flown across the pond

[Verse 3]
I think I love you, ooooh
We must have been together
It's something like I thought it was
And what a lasting impression
You left me with an open door
I want it more and more

[Pre Hook]
It's who we are
Too familiar, solar
Energy carried on and on and on
Ripples in the pond
Like a mirror, solar
Energy carried on and on and

[Hook]
Hey, I think I luh you (luh you)
Fuck that, I know I do, I know I do, I know I do, I know I do
I think I luh you (luh you)
Fuck that, I know I do, I know I do, I know I do, I know I do

[Post Hook]
Energy carried on and on (on and on)
Energy carried on and on (on and on)
Energy carried on and on (on and on)
Energy carried on and on (on and on)

[Bridge]
Nothing that I can't quite put my finger on
Do you believe that we are star crossed
Forgive me if I'm wrong
Forgive me if I'm wrong, spinning off
Energy carried on and on

[Outro]
Energy carried on and on
Energy carried on and on
